features: CETAPHIL BODY MOISTURIZING CREAM FOR DRY TO VERY DRY SKIN: Instantly replenishes, intensely nourishes and soothes skin dryness for 48 hours
CLINICALLY PROVEN TO RESTORE SKIN'S MOISTURE BARRIER IN 1 WEEK: Binds water to the skin, preventing moisture loss to hydrate and protect skin from dryness
NEW AND IMPROVED INGREDIENT BLEND: Now with hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 (panthenol) and B3 (niacinamide)

body.description: Care for your dry to very dry skin with CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream, a non-greasy, moisture rich cream for the whole body. Enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E, it immediately comforts and instantly hydrates dry, sensitive skin. Formulated with a new blend of key ingredients: hydrating glycerin, panthenol (vitamin B5) to hydrate, soothe and preserve the skin barrier, and niacinamide (vitamin B3) to help smooth skin texture and retain skin moisture barrier. For long lasting hydration, this extra strength moisturizer binds water to the skin to deeply replenish the skins moisture and prevent moisture loss, hydrating and soothing skins dryness for 48 hours and completely restoring the skins moisture barrier in one week. Ideal for very dry areas of skin on the hands, feet, elbows and knees, leaving your skin feeling soft, smooth and nourished. This fragrance free, paraben free, and sulfate free formula will not clog pores and is clinically tested for even the most gentle skin. Effectively defends against 5 signs of skin sensitivity.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Nourish and soothe your dry skin with CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream, clinically proven to provide immediate and long lasting relief of dry to very dry, sensitive skin. Enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E, this moisture rich body cream gets to work instantly to hydrate the skin and protect it from dryness for 48 hours, leaving it feeling soft, smooth and nourished. Formulated with our new ingredient blend of niacinamide (vitamin B3), panthenol (vitamin B5) and hydrating glycerin. This improved formula helps to preserve the skin's moisture barrier, improve water retention, soothe the skin, and improve the overall quality of sensitive skin. It is also hypoallergenic, fragrance free and paraben free. Clinically tested for even the most sensitive skin, for effective yet gentle moisturization. This rich moisturizing cream benefits from moisture lock protection. It works by binding water to the skin, which deeply replenishes the skin's moisture barrier to completely restore the barrier in 1 week. This rich cream also provides hydrating nourishment from day 1 and keeps skin hydrated for a full 48 hours. 97% of users agree that skin seems more hydrated over time. Tackle sensitive skin with the help of CETAPHIL. A weakened skin barrier lets more water out while letting irritants in, both of which can lead to dryness and sensitivity. By strengthening and reinforcing the skin barrier, CETAPHIL skin care products defend against 5 signs of skin sensitivity - dryness, irritation, roughness, tightness and a weakened skin barrier.

CETAPHIL is a Dermatologist Recommended Sensitive Skincare Brand used around the world by millions of people with sensitive skin.* *IQVIA 2022 CETAPHIL moisturizers deliver long lasting hydration to replenish and protect the skin's moisture barrier from dryness. CETAPHIL skincare products are clinically tested by dermatologists.* **IQVIA 2022

For best results, use CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream directly after bathing or washing hands to seal in moisture Skin that is not hydrated enough can become dry, tight and flaky. Enjoy more comfort thanks to CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream, with moisture lock protection that improves the skin's hydration from day one. Even more effective when used directly after bathing, so this rich body cream can lock moisture into the skin for intense 48 hour hydration. Everyday hydration formulated for your dry to very dry skin Enriched with sweet almond oil and vitamin E to soothe and deeply replenish the skin, CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream not only improves the skin's hydration from day one, but completely restores the skin's natural moisture barrier in one week. This rich cream is clinically proven to provide immediate and long lasting 48 hour relief for dry to very dry, sensitive skin, leaving it soft and smooth. Dermatologist designed for your sensitive skin Tired of hunting for products that suit your sensitive skin? CETAPHIL Moisturizing Cream has been formulated and clinically tested for use on even the most sensitive skin, making it an excellent moisturizer for the whole body. The non-greasy formula is absorbed immediately so you can get dressed straight away. Ideal for those very dry areas of skin on the feet, elbows and knees that require immediate and intense moisturization. CETAPHIL Body has a skincare product for every body Quickly improve your skin with the fast acting and non-greasy CETAPHIL Moisturizing Lotion, a lightweight body lotion for everyday use that makes a great alternative for all skin types. The nutrient rich formula of avocado oil, vitamins E, B3 and B5 provides just the right amount of instant hydration to soothe and moisturize your skin and starts improving the skin's barrier in just 24 hours. Non-irritating and fragrance free, the body lotion is quickly absorbed to leave skin feeling silky smooth and protected from dryness for 48 hours, defending against 5 signs of skin sensitivity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars PERFECT for after laser treatment!!
reviews.reviewText: I have a moisturizer that I use regularly (Hempz Age Defying) that I love. My skin is not particularly dry, but it does keep my skin well moisturized, and sinks in perfectly, leaving zero oily residue. Recently I had a laser treatment on my face from my plastic surgeon. He recommended Cetaphil to use afterward, and I thought, I don't need that -- I'm perfectly happy with my regular moisturizer. Well, after a week, I was still applying the Hempz about once an hour and my skin was still extremely dry. So, I bought the Cetaphil. Man, this stuff is incredible! I have to say, it doesn't sink in as well as the Hempz, and does leave an oily feel to the skin for a while after application. But, my skin is SOFT, doesn't hurt anymore, and this stuff lasts for hours! I have super sensitive skin and haven't had any reaction to this at all. It is unscented, which is what I prefer. I probably won't use it on a daily basis after my skin is back to normal, just because I don't like the oily feel. But after a laser treatment, or if I were ever to get a sunburn or anything like that, I would use Cetaphil in a heartbeat. I would also use it if I had naturally dry skin. This stuff is fantastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cetaphil Body Moisturizing Cream: A Badass Savior for Your Tattooed Canvas
reviews.reviewText: Being a proud owner of a tattoo is not just about the ink on your skin; it's about maintaining the art, protecting the design, and ensuring that the vibrant colors stay just as striking as the day you got them. And that's where Cetaphil Body Moisturizing Cream truly shines. This cream isn't just a moisturizer; it's a warrior in a tub, a protector of your inked armor, and the ultimate ally for tattooed skin.As soon as you lay your hands on the Cetaphil cream, you know you're dealing with something special. It’s more than a product; it’s a commitment, a promise to your skin and your tattoos that the nourishment they need is at hand. The moment you smear the cream onto your skin, it begins a full-frontal assault on dryness, replenishing and intensely nourishing your skin for a whopping 48 hours. It's like having a round-the-clock bodyguard for your tattoos, protecting them from the onslaught of dryness and flaking.But the Cetaphil Body Moisturizing Cream doesn’t stop there. Clinically proven to restore your skin's moisture barrier in just one week, this cream binds water to your skin like a loyal companion, preventing moisture loss and, in turn, ensuring your tattoos remain vibrant and lustrous. It's not just a cream; it's a hydration superhero on a mission to protect and preserve.The new and improved ingredient blend? Pure badass. Now enriched with hydrating glycerin and skin essential vitamins B5 and B3, Cetaphil not only combats dryness but also nourishes your skin from within. It's like a rejuvenating spa treatment for your tattooed canvas, keeping it healthy and promoting longevity for your body art.And what about sensitive skin? Well, this is where Cetaphil's badassery truly shines. This hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic formula is like a gentle giant, tough on dryness but kind on your skin. Free of fragrances, parabens, and sulfates, it's the perfect partner for even the most sensitive, inked skin. So, whether you're a seasoned tattoo enthusiast or a newcomer to the world of ink, this cream has got your back (and arms, and legs).Cetaphil Body Moisturizing Cream is more than just dermatologist recommended; it's tattoo enthusiast approved. It takes care of your skin like a nurturing guardian while letting your tattoos steal the limelight as they should. Whether you've just added a fresh piece to your collection or you're looking to rejuvenate the colors of an old tattoo, Cetaphil is the badass sidekick you need.In conclusion, Cetaphil Body Moisturizing Cream isn't just an outstanding skincare product; it's the unsung hero in your tattoo aftercare routine. No more faded tattoos, no more dryness. Just vibrant colors, healthy skin, and the confidence that comes with knowing your tattoos are in safe hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do NOT like greasy feeling lotion and I would probably have never tried this, but a friend at work had hers and let me use it. It is thick, but it's not overly greasy and I feel like it works very well. I have very dry skin at times and this helps keep me moisturized and soft.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The Best Body Cream for my Sensitive Skin!
reviews.reviewText: Over the years, I have tried so many body creams, and was never satisfied. Either they didn't moisturize enough, irritated my skin, or were not good economical choices (I put body cream all over my entire body daily, so I use a lot). I used Cetaphil growing up, but after college, I felt the need to use what I felt were higher end body creams.Well, Cetaphil has won over the hundreds of "high end" body creams I have used over the years. My dry, sensitive skin loves it. I love that it does not have fragrance, is hypoallergenic, and it also does not clog my pores, so I literally use it from neck to feet. This cream really seals in moisture and protects my skin, especially in the Winter, When I shower the next day, I can feel that it is still on my skin, hence the reason why the skin on my body is so hydrated all the time.Due to the very economical prices, I buy tubs of this product regularly. If I don't have at least two extra tubs on hand, it gives me anxiety because I love this cream so much.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super Moisturizing and Thick
reviews.reviewText: I love this lotion; I use it for everywhere (body+face). Leaves my skin feeling super soft and moisturized. If you have oily skin like me, your face might look a little shiny, but it’s not too bad. I’d much rather use this and just do touch ups with some powder than have my face feel tight or super greasy. Also, it has no scent which I love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my toddler's dry skin, it holds up well in cold dry weather but needs touching up. It does well in hot weathers more. It makes my son's skin extra soft and his skin is already smooth like butter. I bought it for his dry skin. This is my second purchase so give it a try

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This cream is absolutely amazing
reviews.reviewText: This cream is fabulous super super moisturizing. I had held off from buying it because I didn’t like the name. It just did not appeal to me. But my dermatologist recommended it because I have dry skin. Because I live in Las Vegas. And I’ve noticed a difference using this moisturizing cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is the only lotion that I can use on my very sensitive skin. Over the past few years the price has sky rocketed. I used to purchase at Costco before they stopped selling it. The is by far the cheapest you can find this lotion.As far as the product, it’s a thick, moisturizing lotion that does not leave you greasy.
